ComicInfo.Characters: Patrick (Erica's former boyfriend),Venus,Siren [Erica],Howard (Erica's foster father),Carissa (Erica's foster mother),Samantha Darren,Esmeralda
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:05:51 [Issue ID 4000-309420] urn:comicvine:4000-309420 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 20:57:31. [Issue ID 904064]
ComicInfo.Summary: Esmeralda tells Samantha how a jealous Venus transformed her into the sea witch. Meanwhile, Erica returns to seek vengeance on her foster parents and Patrick. When Samantha and Esmeralda arrive, Samantha tries to talk her out of seeking vengeance, while Esmeralda urges her on. Erica decides against vengeance and changes from a sea creature to her normal mermaid form. However, she has made the deal with Esmeralda that cannot be broken. Esmeralda kills Patrick and Erica's foster parents, then takes Erica away and Samantha can do nothing to stop her.
ComicInfo.Title: The Little Mermaid, Part 4 of 4
